Daily data update formats

column1: The climate station daily data updates are provided as CSV files.
The CSV files contain daily aggregated climate station data and also include virtual (VCSN) data that can be used if station data has gaps.
The column 'Observation time UTC' refers to the preceding interval for the parameters Rain, Temperature, Wind, Radiation, Evaporation. More details on this in the following table.

column51: >The interpolated VCSN data is for period 00:00-24:00
column87:
>This is an instantaneous parameter
